mapper.select: SELECT ua.USER_ID, ua.USER_NM, ua.USER_PW_HASH, ud.USER_EML_ADDR, ud.USER_ROLE FROM USER_AUTH ua JOIN USER_DETAILS ud ON ua.USER_ID = ud.USER_ID WHERE ua.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT e.CONTS_NM AS "컨텐츠명", e.GROUP_UTZTN_NOPE AS "그룹이용인원수", e.REC_AGE AS "권장연령", ua.USER_NM AS "사용자명", ud.USER_RATING AS "사용자등급", ud.USER_ID AS "사용자식별자", ud.USER_ROLE AS "사용자권한", c.CONTS_GRD AS "콘텐츠등급", c.CONTS_PRC AS "콘텐츠가격" FROM EDUCATION_GROUP e JOIN USER_DETAILS ud ON e.USER_ID = ud.USER_ID JOIN USER_AUTH ua ON e.USER_ID = ua.USER_ID JOIN CONTENT c ON c.CONTS_NM = e.CONTS_NM WHERE CONTS_GRD = '초급' limit #{pageStart}, #{amount};

SELECT e.CONTS_NM AS "컨텐츠명", e.GROUP_UTZTN_NOPE AS "그룹이용인원수", e.REC_AGE AS "권장연령", c.UTZTN_BGNG_YMD AS "이용시작일자", ua.USER_NM AS "사용자명", ud.USER_RATING AS "사용자등급", ud.USER_ID AS "사용자식별자", ud.USER_ROLE AS "사용자권한" FROM EDUCATION_GROUP e JOIN USER_DETAILS ud ON e.USER_ID = ud.USER_ID JOIN USER_AUTH ua ON e.USER_ID = ua.USER_ID JOIN CONTENT c ON c.CONTS_NM = e.CONTS_NM ORDER BY c.UTZTN_BGNG_YMD DESC limit #{pageStart}, #{amount};

SELECT c.USER_ID, c.GROUP_NO, cont.CONTS_NM AS contsNm, cont.CONTS_PRC AS contsPrc, (SELECT ua.USER_NM FROM USER_AUTH ua WHERE ua.USER_ID = u.USER_ID) AS userNm, -- 서브쿼리 사용 u.USER_RATING AS userRating, eg.REC_AGE AS recAge FROM CART c JOIN CONTENT cont ON c.GROUP_NO = cont.CONTS_SN JOIN USER_DETAILS u ON c.USER_ID = u.USER_ID JOIN EDUCATION_GROUP eg ON c.GROUP_NO = eg.GROUP_NO WHERE c.USER_ID = #{userId}; -- 사용자 ID를 파라미터로 받음
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND GROUP_NO = #{groupNo};
